programme.title: La Grande Magie
programme.desc: The 1920s, an unhappy young woman staying with her jealous husband in a seaside hotel makes the most of a magic show to disappear. Demanding his wife's return, the husband is given a box he must only open if he has absolute faith in her. Charles begins to have doubts...

programme.title: Pachyderme
programme.desc: This year, as every year, Louise is left with her grandparents for a short holiday in the country. But this year turns out to be very different, it snows and a monster is about to die.

programme.title: Le Crime Lui Va Si Bien - EP 8
programme.desc: As Police Lieutenant Richer returns from leave, she finds the police station buzzing. Her partner, Captain Molina, has disappeared without trace. An internal investigation is launched: she is suspected of stealing evidence concerning a hold-up. Even worse, there is good reason to believe someone is out to kill her.

programme.title: Femmes De L'art - EP 2
programme.desc: She said: ''A woman artist must be capable of making primary sacrifices.'' With Berthe Morisot, the American artist is one of the few women to have taken up Impressionism.

programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Bataille Pour La Foret - EP 6
programme.desc: We explore the concept of an ecosystemic approach to forest management. Now written into Quebec law, it improves the chances of maintaining the biodiversity of forest ecosystems but isn't always put into practice by the forestry industry as it should be.

programme.title: Sur La Route Des Vins Du Nord
programme.desc: Maximilien de Wazieres is a farmer in the Hauts-de-France region. Today, like others before him, he wants to become a winegrower. Crazy? No. In recent years global warming and changes to European regulations have dealt him a new hand: it is now possible to sell wine made in the Nord.

The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 41
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.desc: John Tomasino and Ginny Duff are blind. Despite their disability, they share a real passion for sport, practicing cycling, swimming, skiing, running, sailing... Anne-Marie Rocher follows them as they head off by bike to explore the fabulous landscapes of Georgian Bay, Ontario.

programme.title: Le Specialiste
programme.desc: Hud, a notorious gunslinger, heads for Blackstone to avenge his brother Charlie, lynched by a mob who accused him of stealing from the bank. Convinced of Charlie's innocence, Hud investigates. But no one's talking and the loot is nowhere to be found.

programme.title: Nous Les Griots
programme.desc: Malik, Daouda's eldest son, wants to marry Mariama. But when a meeting between the two families, both originally from Senegal, is organised over a meal, Daouda discovers that they are from two very different social classes. His family is ''griot''; Mariama's is noble.

programme.title: Carte Blanche A Cut Killer
programme.desc: The Moroccan DJ Cut Killer puts on a unique show mixing hip-hop and classic French songs. By inviting established artists and new talent, he shines a spotlight on French diversity and artistic boldness.

programme.desc: Complicity between Fabien Cloutier and Mathieu Lafontaine, who sing Britney Spears, and lively debate with the hotheaded guests. Pascale Renaud-Hebert decides to take revenge and Papi Jay closes the evening in style!

programme.title: Movie - Biriyani
programme.desc: Sugan and Parasuram leave Varadharajan's party drunk in search of a place to have biryani. They get into some serious trouble when they find his dead body in the trunk of their car.

programme.title: Movie - Achchamundu Achchamundu
programme.desc: Senthil and Malini live a content life in New Jersey with their 10-year-old daughter Rithika. However, trouble begins to brew when Robertson, a child predator, comes to paint their basement.

programme.title: Movie - Prasad
programme.desc: Shankar and Malathi are shocked to learn that their son cannot speak and hear. Undeterred, the boy, with the help of his parents, overcomes various odds and becomes a swimming champion.

programme.title: Movie - Aayiram Nilave Vaa
programme.desc: Twins Chander and Suri fall in love with the same girl. However, things take a turn when Chander accidentally kills Suri.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Kudaikul Mazhai
programme.desc: Parthiban, an auto rickshaw driver, falls in love with a girl who loves him too. But later Parthiban learns that the girl is a TV show anchor and was just faking her love for him.

programme.title: Movie - Yes Madam
programme.desc: Although Sivaram is against marriage, he ends up marrying Gayatri. When Sumati and her son move into the house opposite Sivaram's house, Gayatri is shocked to learn that she is Sivaram's first wife.

programme.title: Movie - Dharmam Vellum
programme.desc: Dharmam Vellum is a 1989 Tamil-language action crime film written, produced and directed by K. Rangaraj.

programme.title: Movie - Kaadhal Parisu
programme.desc: Sisters Malini and Chitra are heirs to a huge fortune. Chitra is in for a shock when she introduces her boyfriend to Malini and the latter accuses him of raping her years ago.

programme.title: Movie - Samudhiram
programme.desc: Three brothers would do anything for their only sister. When she is married to the son of a man seeking revenge from their family, the brothers lose all their wealth and are also humiliated by him.

programme.title: Movie - Charlie Chaplin
programme.desc: When Ramakrishnan is caught with a prostitute, he introduces her to his wife as Thiru's girlfriend. Thiru, feeling helpless, goes along with the plan at the cost of upsetting his own girlfriend, Susi.

programme.title: Movie - Enn Thangai
programme.desc: En Thangai is a 1989 Indian Tamil-language film, directed by A. Jagannathan, starring Arjun and Gautami.

programme.title: Movie - Enga Veetu Ramayanam
programme.desc: Engaveetu Ramayanam is a 1987 Indian Tamil film directed by K. Chozha Raajan. The film stars Karthik and Illavarsi.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Sahadevan Mahadevan
programme.desc: Mahadevan goes to the city in search of a job and meets Sahadevan, an unemployed man who is struggling to pay his dues. The two of them soon become friends and get embroiled in a bizarre situation.

programme.title: Movie - Vasanthi
programme.desc: A man is arrested for stealing at a very young age. Upon being released from the prison, he learns about his orphaned sister and circumstances force him to become a habitual offender.

programme.title: Movie - Puthu Vasantham
programme.desc: Three friends earn their living by singing at small functions. One day they meet Sithara who starts living with them. Her fiance does not like this so she proves that they all are just friends.

programme.title: Movie - Ranuva Veeran
programme.desc: Raghu returns to his village and learns that people are being terrorised by a notorious gang. His world comes crashing down when he realises that his sister is in love with the leader of the gang.

programme.title: Movie - Elumalai
programme.desc: A village head prepares for their clan's safety from the neighbouring village thugs. He decides to train one boy from each family and chooses his fourth son for the job. Years later, he runs a classical dance school in the village.

programme.title: Paddy Power World Darts Championships 2024/25
programme.desc: The Paddy Power World Darts Championship 2024/25 will see 96 players compete for the Sid Waddell Trophy and £2.5 million in prize money.

programme.title: supertri League 2024
programme.desc: The supertri League is a triathlon event where athletes tackle the same supertri format across all five rounds of the League across five different cities. It is three continuous rounds of swim, bike and run with no breaks in the action.

programme.title: Cazoo World Snooker Championship 2024 Rd 1 - 9 (Judd Trump v Hossein Vafaei)
programme.desc: Every year, the best snooker players on the planet will go through a test of endurance, skill and mental toughness at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield with an ultimate goal: to lift snooker’s most famous and coveted trophy, the World Snooker Championship

programme.title: ASO Sailing Programming 2024
programme.desc: The Vendée Globe is a single-handed, non-stop, non-assisted round-the-world sailing race that takes place every 4 years. The skippers set off from Les Sables-d'Olonne in Vendée and sail around 45,000 kilometres around the globe, rounding the three legendary capes (Good Hope, Leeuwin and finally Cape Horn) before returning to Les Sables d'Olonne. The race has acquired an international reputation, attracting skippers from all over the world.

programme.desc: Brentford are unbeaten in all four of their Premier League meetings with Nottingham Forest (W2 D2), winning both home games against them in the competition.

programme.desc: Leicester are unbeaten in all six of their Premier League home games against Wolves (W4 D2), conceding just one goal in that run. They’ve won each of their last three against them at the King Power Stadium.

programme.title: FS MMA
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! This episode highlights The Best of Women's MMA from St. Petersburg, Russia.

programme.title: WCCB Jean Pascal vs. Michael Eifert
programme.desc: In this episode Jean Pascal (36-6-1, 20 KOs) and Michael Eifert (11-1, 4 KOs) battle it out in the main event from Place Bell in Laval, Canada. The contest pits Haitian-Canadian former world champion and a contender from Germany. The pair squares off in this 12 round IBF light heavyweight title eliminator.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about how the use of motion animation technology can help martial artists learn more efficient ways to put extra power behind their punches and kicks.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavily-anticipated contest featuring two of boxing's greats - Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Oscar De La Hoya. This fight set the record for most pay-per-view buys, as 2.4 million purchases led to over $135 million in revenue. The winner of this closely-contested bout would be WBC light middleweight champion.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Chiyonokuni, Tamawashi, Takayasu and Chiyotairyu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The next season opens with a qualifying round in Venice Beach, California. More than half of the obstacles used on this season were never seen before, and this premiere features exciting new challenges such as the Frame Slider, Domino Hill, Chain Swing and Flying Nun Chucks. Returning fan favorites in Venice Beach include parkour enthusiasts Kyle Cochran and Brent Steffensen.

programme.title: FS MMA
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! This episode highlights The Best of Women's MMA from St. Petersburg, Russia.

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Tavoris Cloud
programme.desc: Coming off a tremendous amateur career where he captured Gold Medals in the World Championships and European Championships, Olympian Artur Beterbiev takes a big step up in competition in just his 6th pro fight, taking on former IBF Light Heavyweight World Champion Tavoris Cloud. Beterbiev had stormed through his first five opponents, scoring four knockouts, two of which took place in the first round.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 10: California, USA - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kajukenbo and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Throws with Masters Charles Gaylord and Greg Harper.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. It's a closely scored bout, but one fighter's push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Mitakeumi, Abi, Hakuho and Chiyotairyu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best judo of the World Team Championships from Budapest, where we will see history made as it's the first time a new mixed gender team format will be seen.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features interviews with 2-time UFC heavyweight champion Frank Mir where he discusses his "Legend" Status and his UFC debut, as well as an interview with his wife and manager Jenny Mir and how she juggles motherhood and her husband's career. UFC President Dana White stops by and checks out some possible TUF competitors.

programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features main event Dricus 'Stillknocks' Du Plessis vs. Brendan Lesar in the Middleweight Championsihp from EFC 83 in Pretoria, South Africa.

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Tavoris Cloud
programme.desc: Coming off a tremendous amateur career where he captured Gold Medals in the World Championships and European Championships, Olympian Artur Beterbiev takes a big step up in competition in just his 6th pro fight, taking on former IBF Light Heavyweight World Champion Tavoris Cloud. Beterbiev had stormed through his first five opponents, scoring four knockouts, two of which took place in the first round.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 10: California, USA - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kajukenbo and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Throws with Masters Charles Gaylord and Greg Harper.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. It's a closely scored bout, but one fighter's push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Mitakeumi, Abi, Hakuho and Chiyotairyu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best judo of the World Team Championships from Budapest, where we will see history made as it's the first time a new mixed gender team format will be seen.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features interviews with 2-time UFC heavyweight champion Frank Mir where he discusses his "Legend" Status and his UFC debut, as well as an interview with his wife and manager Jenny Mir and how she juggles motherhood and her husband's career. UFC President Dana White stops by and checks out some possible TUF competitors.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus Du Plessis vs. Brendan Lesar
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features main event Dricus 'Stillknocks' Du Plessis vs. Brendan Lesar in the Middleweight Championsihp from EFC 83 in Pretoria, South Africa.

programme.title: WCCB Gervonta Davis vs. Hector Luis Garcia
programme.desc: Five time World Champion and boxing superstar Gervonta 'Tank' Davis and undefeated World Champion Hector Luis Garcia kick off the year by headlining a stacked card from the Capital One Arena in Washington DC. Davis has established himself as one boxing's must-see attractions, and will be defending his WBA Lightweight World Championship against Garcia in the Main Event.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Shane Mosley vs. Saul (Canelo) Alvarez
programme.desc: This episode features the WBC light middleweight title bout when Shane Mosley battles Saul (Canelo) Alvarez, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Winky Wright
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight title contest featuring 47-4-1 Bernard Hopkins and the 51-3-1 Winky Wright, who has not lost a bout in over seven years.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Goeido, Abi, Kisenosato and Tochinoshin from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector 'Macho' Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 33
programme.desc: Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 34
programme.desc: Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrel's activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 35
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 36
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warm-up run together. The Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but they are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 37
programme.desc: The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 38
programme.desc: The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, don't interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 39
programme.desc: The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they aren't sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 40
programme.desc: When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: It's raining, so Duggee and the squirrels stay indoors to do some drawing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Happy finds a cake lying around in the field and decides to eat it. But whose cake is it?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Duggee is having a bad hair day. Can the squirrels help him at all?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 4

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Enid the cat is stuck up the tree. How will Duggee and the squirrels get her down?

programme.desc: The squirrels read a super-hero comic and decide they want to be super squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Duggee is making jam, but then his fruit is stolen.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: The Squirrels find a treasure map inside Duggee's big shiny ruby.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: The birds keep eating Duggee's grain, so the squirrels build a scarecrow.

programme.desc: Duggee got a bouncy castle for Tag's birthday, who will get a chance to try it out?

programme.desc: Duggee decides to make an omelette, but there's no eggs. Those chickens need to get busy!

programme.desc: Duggee shows the squirrels how to make a paper boat out of newspaper.

programme.desc: Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock. When a wooden cuckoo pops out singing "Cuckoo!", Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 231
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are going for a day's cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she's not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa's friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 - EP 114
programme.desc: Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic! Bubu joins them, even when the DVD player is fixed, they prefer to stay in the backyard to play!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 - EP 115
programme.desc: Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal."

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 - EP 207

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 - EP 103
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 - EP 622

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 - EP 109
programme.desc: Katie and her cat Cali are on the chair lift when it stops leaving them above the ski hill with no way to get down!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 - EP 206

programme.desc: Dora and Boots have to wake up the Big Red Chicken before he floats over a waterfall! // Dora and friends must solve a series of questions and challenges to open a mysterious gift.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 - EP 102
programme.desc: Max's new best friend, Sharkdog, comes home with him, but keeping him a secret from his parents is a challenge.

programme.desc: Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate but it turns out he is a natural born skater. Peppa and George love ice-skating.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 233
programme.desc: Peppa and George are at the dentist. Dr Elephant says that Peppa and George's teeth are lovely and clean. But George's plastic toy "Mr Dinosaur" teeth are a bit yellow. Dr Elephant polishes Mr Dinosaurs teeth until they are bright and shiny.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 234
programme.desc: Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls, and George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built for them. But when it starts to rain and the garden is covered in muddy puddles, they rush out to play together!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 - EP 221
programme.desc: It's Christmas day & the Browns get locked out. Will they get in in time for dinner & still have a merry Christmas? // It's the Windsor Gardens Parade & Paddington has to lead it when Ms. Potts gets injured. Can Simi help him find the beat?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 - EP 119
programme.desc: After the Crew builds a special lemonade stand for Lucas and Lily, a sour Speed Meister sends it rolling through Builder Cove! // Why does Crunchy the beaver cross the road? Because Rubble & Crew build a bridge to help him get to the other side!

programme.title: Dora S1 - EP 109
programme.desc: Dora, Boots, and Benny have to trek through the rainforest to deliver a big, delicate tres leches cake to Benny's abuela. // Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise that caused them to lose their instruments.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 - EP 626
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve and Blaze, AJ, Crusher, Pickle, and all their other friends are helping Santa ready his sleigh for delivery.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 - EP 201
programme.desc: It's the Mish Mesh Special! Chef and friends host a celebration of everyone's favorite holiday traditions. Chef makes his marvelous Mish Mesh cookies, saving one to give to Santa. The only problem is, Chef forgot to send Santa his invitation letter!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 - EP 101
programme.desc: With Fishmas around the corner, the season's hottest toy- Burpin' Bubbz - is at the top of Baby Shark's and William's wish lists. But when Santa Jaws goes missing, it's up to them to save Fishmas if they're ever going to get their fins on that toy.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 - EP 218
programme.desc: When Sharkdog steals the show in the new aquarium commercial, Max must overcome a serious case of jealousy.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 - EP 219
programme.desc: When Sharkdog doesn't come home from the aquarium, the Sharkpack go on a mission to find their missing friend!

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 - EP 220
programme.desc: The Sharkpack must stop Mr. Ceviche before he spills Sharkdog's secret.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 - EP 101
programme.desc: Max is desperate for a dog, but when he finds Sharkdog while paddle boarding he gets a pet - and friend - who is way more bizarre and fun than he expected.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 - EP 40
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S2 - EP 41
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S3 - EP 73
programme.desc: Puss gets jealous when Guy Fox shows up and asks Dulcinea to run off with him

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S3 - EP 73
programme.desc: Hiccup teams with an unexpected person in search for an antidote when Toothless is seemingly poisoned

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: Tip and Oh make their first inside joke and Oh shares it with everyone; Tip watches Oh's new alien plant while he's gone and breeds a catastrophe.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S3 - EP 73
programme.desc: King Julien organizes an Academic Bowl to prove the lemurs are the smartest on the island

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 - EP 47
programme.desc: While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 - EP 47
programme.desc: Skidmark gets jealous when White Shadow and Turbo become best friends; the crew must race as a bobsled team against the favored Jamaican Chickens.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S2 - EP 47
programme.desc: Keith and Krolia cross a new space universe in search of a powerful source of Quintessence

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: During a food-themed show, Peabody realizes he is out of shape but still just can't stop eating so it’s up to Sherman to help him lose weight

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 67
programme.desc: The tots are playing at pirates, all except Primrose, who is being a princess, naturally. But guess which tot has the best pirating skills when they are needed

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 68
programme.desc: Primrose has broken her new necklace and lost the beads. She is unconsolable. Violet holds a make and do party to replace the necklace

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 41
programme.desc: Queen Sparklewings is having a fairy picnic in Fable Forest that evening. Everyone offers to help set up for the picnic but Queen Sparklewings tells them not to worry - the fairies can do it all. Later, when Noddy and all his friends are approaching Fable Forest Station on the train they discover someone has redirected the train tracks. They can't get to Fable Forest. How will they have the picnic in time? Noddy needs to investigate why the train tracks have been moved.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 42
programme.desc: Noddy returns from a Make and Take party at Pat-Pat's and finds the Builders are constructing a big orange palace in Toy Green. by order of the King of Toyland! Noddy decides to investigate: who is the mysterious King of Toyland? He spots the Knights carrying a royal litter, but all he can see inside is the top of an orange crown. Realising the King's favourite colour must be orange, Noddy remembers seeing Pat-Pat painting a bowl of oranges and wonders if she knows who the King is.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 41
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Parrot was the best keeper of secrets in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Infact Parrot couldn't open his beak at all! Then one day some beast dares to steal Lion's mane and Parrot sees the whole thing! But how is going to tell Lion?! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 42
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Bushbaby didn't have big eyes. She had tiny little eyes and she was always getting lost. Strange things begin to happen and there are stories that Majitu the Great Giant has returned to Tinga Tinga. Young Bushbaby doesn't believe a word of it... and convinces the other animals that Majitu the Giant does not exist. "If you can't see him, he's not real". But then she does see the Giant and her eyes grow big as planets. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 41
programme.desc: Roary is in a mischievous mood and keeps crashing into things. Big Chris has a great idea how Roary can burn up all his energy and be helpful at the same time!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 42
programme.desc: Farmer Green and FB are very nervous about going to Mama Mia's garden party. James and the other cars offer to teach them how to behave at such an event. But everything doesn't quite go to plan…

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! S2 - EP 28
programme.desc: Tag's scooter breaks down during a Race Cadet challenge to deliver boxes of Sam Whippet’s Chocolate Chippet’s the fastest. So Tag and Scooch must rely on other ways of getting around town. / Muttfield the Magnificent is set to perform a magic show at Yip’s birthday party! Until he accidentally makes himself disappear. Muttfield instructs Tag and Scooch to retrieve three magical items to make him appear again. But can they do it in time?

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: SPIRIT OF CHRISTMAS (RIDING FREE) S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus - EP 1
programme.desc: _x000D_ _x000D_When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin’s time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn’t work quite how they’d hoped.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 68
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina’s startup company for exploding baby Iggy’s favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp’s current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 69
programme.desc: On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict "no-babies" policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 70
programme.desc: An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits’ fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, "Bridges Aflame." Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.desc: Allura and Lance walk in on Shiro, Pidge, Hunk, and Coran playing a magical role-playing board game

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When a special guest is revealed as the villainous Goldentoe and hijacks the show, Peabody and Sherman must find a way to escape and regain control

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 69
programme.desc: Bumble's sneezing has got so bad, it is keeping everyone awake at night. Webby gives Fifi a recipe for a cure for sneezes… will it work?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 70
programme.desc: There is a horrid smell in Fifi's garden. Fifi goes to stay with Primrose and Violet while they try and work out where the smell is coming from. What could be causing it?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 43
programme.desc: Everyone is decorating special balloons in Toyland. They're going to have a big Balloon Release at the end of the day and see how far they can fly. But when Noddy returns in the afternoon with Big Ears, the balloons have already flown away! Noddy decides to investigate. Following all the clues, he arrives at Deltoid's house. The action hero toy tells him that he only took back his specially decorated balloon. The others were still there earlier.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 44
programme.desc: Noddy and his friends are building a toy tower. Carlton is joining in and having a great time. They've almost finished when one of the brick pieces goes missing! Oh no. How can they finish the tower without the last brick? Noddy needs to investigate. Using his detecting skills Noddy soon finds the missing brick.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 43
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Guinea Fowl didn't have dots. She was an adventurous bird and loved to discover things. One day Tortoise challenges her to find out why the top of Mount Tinga Tinga shines. Guinea Fowl can't resist and races off, over the desert, past the ocean, up to the very top of Mount Tinga Tinga where she does indeed discover why the top of Mount Tinga Tinga shines.... SNOW! Guinea Fowl is the first ever animal to see snow! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 44
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Buffalo didn't have horns. He had very long shaggy hair and he lived near the Swamp. But then one day the Swamp moves and Buffalo has to find a new home! The Swamp grows and grows and soon all the horned animals who live on the Plains risk losing their home too. So Buffalo decides to save the day and push back the muddy swamp. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 43
programme.desc: Big Chris has agreed to do a parachute jump for charity but loses his nerve on the big day. Can Roary talk him through it, just like Big Chris did for him when he got scared?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 44
programme.desc: The brass band booked for the Silver Hatch parade have cancelled. Mr Carburettor will be furious if he doesn't have music at his parade. Roary and his friends think up an ingenious plan...

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! S2 - EP 29
programme.desc: When Tag volunteers to be Mayor for the day, she promises everyone an ice cream party. But as she tries to do everything herself, the party plans begin to fall apart. programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Previously, Meyers served as head writer on "Saturday Night Live" and anchor on the show’s wildly popular "Weekend Update."

programme.title: Meet The Press 2024
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. programme.title: Millennial Money
programme.desc: Putting the "personal" in personal finance, get an inside look at the lives and finances of millennials. See exactly how much they earn, what they spend it on and how they invest. programme.title: Date With Nature
programme.desc: The series consists of 10 dating episodes with unique natural phenomena. The series was created on the basis of materials filmed by the team of the TV channels "Wild Nature HD" and "Home 4K". Filming was carried out in more than 350 locations around the world for 8 years.

programme.title: The World From Above
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Animal Keeper
programme.desc: A program that contains the daily lives of animal handlers tigers, lions, snakes, bears, elephants, crocodiles and leopards packed with entertaining education.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. programme.title: Journey to the Farthest Scenic Station: Gabonese Republic, Africa
programme.desc: Some stations in the world are located in secluded areas such as deep mountains, valleys, and vast deserts. In the program, a traveler explores the meaning of those stations and savors the railway journey to out-of-the-way places.

programme.title: What the Villains Have to Say
programme.desc: Cockroaches, Carbon dioxide, Unwanted hair... Villains are anathema to the public as being "dirty, noxious, and ugly." But even villains have a point they want you to hear! In this program, we look at their amazing abilities revealed by the latest research, as well as the real villains, who are actually a little bit fascinating!

programme.desc: A scientific information program which explains the latest research, disasters and accidents from scientific aspects with a virtual set in the studio.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Carnation" Encore Eps. 79
programme.desc: A heroine born into a kimono store family in Kishiwada, Osaka, holds admiration for clothing and discovers a sewing machine. Despite her father's opposition, she is undeterred and pursues her passion for dressmaking. She opens a store at age 20 and gets married, but her husband dies in the war. The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japan's fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

programme.title: News: Good Morning, Japan

programme.title: Drama Serial "Omusubi" Eps. 61
programme.desc: A Heisei youth graffiti drama, in which the heroine Yoneda Yui (Hashimoto Kanna), born in the first year of the Heisei era, connects people's hearts to the future as a nutritionist. Always cherishing her individuality, she sometimes struggles, but powerfully and joyfully pushes through the turbulent Heisei and Reiwa eras.

programme.title: asaichi

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers-New Beginnings
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: ETV Special "Silence Under the Law
programme.desc: The Supreme Court ruled in July that the Eugenic Protection Law is unconstitutional. Thirty-nine of approximately 25,000 victims have sued the government. Many of them still carry the wounds in their hearts. Why has society overlooked forced sterilization for half a century? The documentary explores the reasons behind the silence caused by the Eugenic Protection Law from both the victims' and society's perspectives.

programme.title: Information Worth Knowing from the News Commentator Bureau
programme.desc: The commentators present trending news, its background, and engaging information related to daily life in an easy-to -understand manner.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Come Come Everybody" Encore Eps. 26
programme.desc: In 1925, radio broadcasting was initiated in Japan and soon after, a program for English language learners began. programme.desc: Keep up with the news on the entertainment circle in Hong Kong and all over the world, with reports on the latest drama series, movies, concert highlights, award ceremonies and more.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every day.

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 3
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: Forensic JD - EP 8
programme.desc: While assisting the police in their investigation and trying to reverse the case involving her father, forensic doctor Song An Yan (Charlene Choi) joins hands with hot-blooded detective Liu Zhi Ming (Joseph Chang) in their desperate search for the truth.

programme.title: Forensic JD - EP 9
programme.desc: While assisting the police in their investigation and trying to reverse the case involving her father, forensic doctor Song An Yan (Charlene Choi) joins hands with hot-blooded detective Liu Zhi Ming (Joseph Chang) in their desperate search for the truth.

programme.title: A Female Student Arrives at the Imperial College - EP 7
programme.desc: Story of the only daughter of the Grand Marshal, Sang Qi, who becomes the only female student at the Imperial College.

programme.title: ICAC Investigators 2024 - EP 4
programme.desc: The brand-new series ICAC Investigators 2024 continues to educate the public about the dangers of corruption, while also showcasing the indomitable and fearless spirit of the anti-corruption staff.

programme.title: ICAC Investigators 2024 - EP 5
programme.desc: The brand-new series ICAC Investigators 2024 continues to educate the public about the dangers of corruption, while also showcasing the indomitable and fearless spirit of the anti-corruption staff.

programme.title: Good Partner - EP 7
programme.desc: The story follows popular divorce lawyer Cha Eun-Kyung (Jang Na-ra), who finds herself faced with her own marital crisis. She often clashes with rookie lawyer Han Yoo-Ri (Nam Ji-Hyun) over cases. A workplace battle between the two lawyers is about to unfold.

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger - EP 3
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: Evilive - EP 4
programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: Hilarious Family - EP 15
programme.desc: This heartwarming drama tells the story of Du Ruyu (Liu Lin), a single mother who has been widowed for 18 years, raising her four daughters, each with very different personalities, on her own. The family is filled with both laughter and tears.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1847
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 519
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes VI: Redemption - EP 23
programme.desc: Confronted with a series of complex mystery cases, Forensic Scientist Yu Xingbo (Bosco Wong), Inspector Jing Haoran (Benjamin Yuen), and Forensic Doctor Fan Peiqing (Jacky Cai) use science to unravel the mysteries step by step and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Are You The One - EP 29
programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1847
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: The Legend of Heroes - EP 2

programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 19
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 25
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 26
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 33
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: Word Twisters' Adventures - EP 16
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate - EP 16
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, De's father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)'s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 16
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Seventh Day, The - EP 2
programme.desc: The tale begins on the seventh of August, when WING and YAN first encounter their own dream girl on the island. WING works as a lifeguard on the outlying island. He gets to know pet shop assistant LING KA-YAN (CHOW LAI KI, NIKI) by chance and is soon mesmerized by her endearing personality. YAN who works at a coffee shop meets a romance comic artist called WONG CHI-KWAN (TONG SZE WING, NATALIE). Being misled into believing that the girl is from a rich family, YAN decides to chase her.

programme.title: Highs and Lows - EP 5
programme.desc: As a Senior Inspector of the Narcotics Bureau Operation Unit, HEUNG WING (Miu Kiu Wai) profoundly abhors evil. He and WAI SAI-LOK (Raymond Lam) - Senior Inspector of the Intelligence Unit have closely co-operated with each other as peer mentors, frequently solving drug trafficking cases for the Police Force. During an operation to knock down the targets, SAI-LOK discovers clues that HEUNG WING is most likely the corrupt cop in a collusion conspiracy with drug dealers.

programme.title: Highs and Lows - EP 6

programme.title: As Sure as Fate - EP 16
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, De's father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)'s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 16
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Seventh Day, The - EP 2
programme.desc: The tale begins on the seventh of August, when WING and YAN first encounter their own dream girl on the island. WING works as a lifeguard on the outlying island. He gets to know pet shop assistant LING KA-YAN (CHOW LAI KI, NIKI) by chance and is soon mesmerized by her endearing personality. YAN who works at a coffee shop meets a romance comic artist called WONG CHI-KWAN (TONG SZE WING, NATALIE). Being misled into believing that the girl is from a rich family, YAN decides to chase her.

programme.title: Highs and Lows - EP 5
programme.desc: As a Senior Inspector of the Narcotics Bureau Operation Unit, HEUNG WING (Miu Kiu Wai) profoundly abhors evil. He and WAI SAI-LOK (Raymond Lam) - Senior Inspector of the Intelligence Unit have closely co-operated with each other as peer mentors, frequently solving drug trafficking cases for the Police Force. During an operation to knock down the targets, SAI-LOK discovers clues that HEUNG WING is most likely the corrupt cop in a collusion conspiracy with drug dealers.

programme.title: Highs and Lows - EP 6
programme.desc: As a Senior Inspector of the Narcotics Bureau Operation Unit, HEUNG WING (Miu Kiu Wai) profoundly abhors evil. He and WAI SAI-LOK (Raymond Lam) - Senior Inspector of the Intelligence Unit have closely co-operated with each other as peer mentors, frequently solving drug trafficking cases for the Police Force. YAN who works at a coffee shop meets a romance comic artist called WONG CHI-KWAN (TONG SZE WING, NATALIE). Being misled into believing that the girl is from a rich family, YAN decides to chase her.
